column4: I get the nvidia spashscreen now, that you to who helped me fix that, but even though the beryl applet shows up, beryl is not working, and i have a stange problem with my clock applet being in the middle of the top of my screen instead of all the way to the right
that used to happen to me, I had to uninstall and reinstall beryl
no problem, if it still persists try asking in #beryl
